m_szDocSumamry: Reprints Apple ( AAPL ) has not revealed whether it is making an electric car, but rumors of the vehicle have imaginations firing. Motor Trend, one of the most respected car magazines, on Thursday published its own speculation about the Apple Car . For its deep dive into what the Apple Car would look like, it consulted auto industry experts and faculty at the ArtCenter College of Design in Pasadena, Calif.
